(OOC: And so we begin!!)

As Lamia followed Marauder down the large hall, the light slowly got
brighter as they walked, although it never really became more than a
haze of crimson. Enough to see by, but not truly bright by any
standards.

Finally the hall opened into a giant chasm, easily 100 meters across.
However it's width that gave its size, it was its depth.

"This was once a great thermal vent dear Lamia, but it has been put to
better uses." Marauder spoke, his voice betraying a bit of pride and
accomplishment. "There was a time when volcanic rock poured through
this very channel that we walked, flowing out onto the surface of the
ground. But now its power is banked and curbed and channeled to our
own uses." Maurader laughed.

"Sir." came a voice out of the crimson gloom from up ahead. "It is
good to see you have returned. All is nearly in readiness."

As the voice spoke a figure stepped out of the shadows, obviously
having come from somewhere further in the chasm. His armored chassis
was predominantly purple and black, although it was difficult to make
out the hue in the strange redness of the area. A large insectile head
made up the figure's broad and powerful chest while insect-like wings
were folded down his back, giving him a regal, almost kingly visage.

"You have done well!" Marauder said as he looked approvingly upon the figure.

The figure nodded, a slight smile appearing on his face, and then he
turned his head as his optics fell on Lamia. He looked at her
curiously as he steped further into the light. He was not overly tall,
but although he was deferential to Marauder, there was still something
about him that was commanding as more of his form was revealed.

"Ahh yes." Marauder said magnanimously, "Where are my manners?" he
smiled as he stepped back slightly, "Lamia, meet Dirge, my second in
command here. " Maruader gestured at Lamia, "Dirge meet Lamia, she is
another of the Minions to have found her way back home."

Maruader nodded as he looked at both of them in satisfaction,
"Together, with the legions we are ready to build, we will bring this
planet to its knees! and will serve the might of UNICRON" Mauraduer
laughed evilly, "BWHAHAHAHA!!"

(TAG)

Preston

OOC: I will be putting up a profile soon :)
